ygData.subject: Re: EQ_Neriak created
ygData.msgSnippet: Ghouls are NASTY,they are most certinnaly not newbie fodder. Level wise I am not sure where they are at but they do con red to my level 11 Shadow Knight.For
ygData.messageBody:
Ghouls are NASTY,they are most certinnaly not newbie fodder. Level wise I am
not sure where they are at but they do con red to my level 11 Shadow
Knight.For newbie fodder in Neriak make your way out into the Niktolus
forest (The Dark Elf newbie zone) At level 1 I would suggest sticking to
moss snakes and decaying skeles,once you hit 2 move on to fire beetles and
spiderlings,just make sure to con them first as some of them are going to be
to powerfull for you to take, and further both spiderlings and fire beetles
will mob you so be aware of your surroundings before engageing them in
combat. at 5 theres 2 skele spawn points you can camp at in the forest to
gain exp but they are usally pretty crowded,may suggestion would be to move
on to North Ro at this point and focus on Orc Raiders.they are decent prey
for this level and carry decent loot most times. Hope this helps....


--Nassu,Dark Knight of Innoruuk,Fennin Ro

short, my system freezes on Veehsan and test has a much lower head count.
>

>
>I've seen one skeleton pet, but don't think
>that should be my first target.
>
>I've seen the 3 ghouls, and one that parades
>around The Lodge of the Dead, are these
>the equivilent of rats, bats and snakes in Freeport?
>
>Maxlis
